subject: Urgent: Limited Time Offer!
body: Hi there, We have an amazing deal just for you! Limited time only - 50% off all products. Act now before it's too late! Click here to buy now.

subject: Quick Question About Your Marketing Strategy
body: Hello [Name], I noticed your company has been growing rapidly in the fintech space. I'd love to discuss how our marketing automation platform has helped similar companies increase their lead generation by 40%. Would you be open to a brief 15-minute call this week? Best regards, Sarah

subject: Partnership Opportunity - Revenue Share
body: Dear CEO, We have identified your company as a potential strategic partner. Our revenue-sharing model could generate significant additional income for your business. We've worked with companies like yours and increased their revenue by 25% on average. Let's schedule a call to discuss this exciting opportunity. Sincerely, Mike

subject: Follow-up: Your Demo Request
body: Hi there, Just following up on your demo request from last week. Our platform can help streamline your operations and reduce costs by up to 30%. I have some time slots available this week - would Tuesday at 2pm work for you? Thanks, Alex

subject: Important Update About Your Account
body: Hello, We noticed some unusual activity on your account and wanted to reach out immediately. Please review your recent transactions and contact us if you see anything suspicious. For your security, we recommend updating your password as soon as possible. Our support team is available 24/7 to assist you. Best, Customer Service Team
